ModMetaData.name: ED-Laser Drill
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 0.18.0 Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=18995
Adds a Laser Drill that allows the creation of new steam vents, and a Laser Filler that allows you to remove unwanted steam vents.
